message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be valuable to you. My initial offer for this exceptional item is $950000. I look forward to discussing the details and potentially closing this deal with you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline. Given the unique qualities and high demand for this product, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. My counteroffer for the product is $900000. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations and we can move forward towards a successful transaction.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $875000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your proposal, I am pleased to counter with an offer of $890000 for the product. This reflects my commitment to finding a fair and satisfactory solution for both parties. I look forward to your response and hope we can finalize this transaction.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $885000 for the product.

I appreciate your continued engagement, Bob. Based on your counteroffer, I am willing to consider $895000 for the product. This price reflects its unique value and market positioning. I hope this offer resonates with you and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $890000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. In response to your latest offer, I am proposing a price of $900000 for the product. This reflects its exceptional quality and the value it offers. I hope this proposal will facilitate a successful conclusion to our negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a final price of $895000 for the product.
